# Nuxt zodI18n documentation

> Translate zod error message easily

## Documentation Sets

- [Nuxt zodI18n documentation - Full Documentation](https://xibman-nuxt-zod-i18n.nuxt.space//llms-full.txt): This is the full documentation for the Nuxt zodI18n.

## Getting Started

- [Introduction](https://xibman-nuxt-zod-i18n.nuxt.space/getting-started): Welcome to Nuxt zodI18n documentation.
- [Installation](https://xibman-nuxt-zod-i18n.nuxt.space/getting-started/installation): Get started with zodI18n.
- [Configuration](https://xibman-nuxt-zod-i18n.nuxt.space/getting-started/configuration): Nuxt zodI18n configuration guide

## Usage

- [How to use](https://xibman-nuxt-zod-i18n.nuxt.space/usage/how-to-use): Learn how to use Nuxt zodI18n.
- [Overload translation](https://xibman-nuxt-zod-i18n.nuxt.space/usage/overload-translation): Learn how to overload translation from zodI18n.
- [Error interpolation](https://xibman-nuxt-zod-i18n.nuxt.space/usage/error-interpolation): Learn how to overload translation from zodI18n.

## Add or improve translation

- [Add / Improve translation](https://xibman-nuxt-zod-i18n.nuxt.space/add-improve-translation): Add / Improve Nuxt zodI18n translations
